name: Espresso
description: Strong and pure coffee made by forcing hot water under pressure through finely-ground coffee beans.

name: Latte
description: Smooth espresso mixed with steamed milk and a light layer of foam on top. Perfect for mornings.

name: Cappuccino
description: Classic Italian coffee made with equal parts espresso, steamed milk, and foam.

name: Americano
description: Espresso diluted with hot water, offering a rich flavor similar to drip coffee.

name: Mocha
description: A delicious blend of espresso, chocolate syrup, and steamed milk topped with whipped cream.

name: Flat White
description: A velvety coffee with smooth microfoam milk poured over a strong double espresso.

name: Macchiato
description: Espresso marked with a small amount of milk foam, offering a bold yet balanced taste.

name: Cold Brew
description: Brewed slowly in cold water for 12 hours, resulting in a smooth and less acidic coffee.

name: Iced Latte
description: Espresso combined with cold milk and ice cubes for a refreshing summer drink.

name: Ice Coffee
description: Chilled coffee served over ice with milk or cream. A perfect pick-me-up on a hot day.
